content.description: A student is doing an experiment in which monochromatic light passes through a double slit, creating a pattern of dark and bright lines on a nearby screen. The student has a red light and a green light. The student also has two sets of slits, one with a smaller separation between the slits and one with a larger separation.
content.question:
Which of the following combinations of light color and slit separation will create the pattern with the greatest separation between the bright lines?

Color
 Slit Separation

A
 Green
 Large

B
 Green
 Small

C
 Red
 Large

D
 Red
 Small
